comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Leifur Magnusson (July 7, 1882 - February 15, 1960) was an economist with International Labor Organization. He was born in Iceland on July 7, 1882. He died in a traffic accident in Claremont, California on February 15, 1960 I started an entry for him in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leifur_Magnusson

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: LOC not misspelling, should be Leifur, not Leifer

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to both of you for finding this error.  We'll make the correction to the name the next time we update.
